Topic.Title: Possible source of good public domain art

Posts.EditableText:
A lot of the paintings on this site will be in the public domain (in places where that is the authors lifespan plus 100 years), although you'll probably still want to cite the artist. I'd recommend John Atkinson Grimshaw if you want some beautifully dark and dramatic art. 

https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:John_Atkinson_Grimshaw
